metadata.title: XPLife - Sube de Nivel Tu Vida
metadata.description: Convierte tus metas en misiones épicas RPG. Gana XP. Mantén rachas. Conviértete en tu mejor versión con optimización de vida impulsada por IA.

hero.badge: Únete a más de 1,000 jugadores subiendo de nivel ahora
hero.title: Sube de Nivel
hero.description: Transforma metas aburridas en misiones épicas RPG. La IA crea tus misiones diarias. Gana XP. Sube de nivel de verdad.

questions.question: When you wake up, what energizes you most?
options: A thrilling new challenge or adventure
Learning something new or creative work
Connecting with loved ones or community

questions.question: How do you prefer to handle stress?
options: Talking it out with friends or family

questions.question: What type of goals excite you the most?
options: Bold, ambitious goals with big rewards

questions.question: How would your friends describe you?
What is your ideal way to recharge?
options: Deep focus on a passion project
Quality time with people I care about

dopamine.title: The Adventurer
dopamine.description: You thrive on excitement, novelty, and bold challenges. Your quests will focus on pushing boundaries and achieving ambitious goals.

acetylcholine.title: The Thinker
acetylcholine.description: You love learning, creativity, and deep focus. Your quests will center around skill mastery and intellectual growth.

gaba.title: The Guardian
gaba.description: You value stability, consistency, and inner peace. Your quests will build strong habits and promote balance.

serotonin.title: The Connector
serotonin.description: You draw energy from relationships and community. Your quests will strengthen bonds and promote meaningful connections.

onboarding.title: Discover Your Player Type
onboarding.subtitle: Answer 5 quick questions to unlock your personalized quest system
onboarding.question: Question {current} of {total}

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Log in to continue your journey

footer.tagline: Level up your life, one quest at a time.
